translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほう、グッドなものなんだろうな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, it must be something good."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふふ、それはもう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, of course.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わたくし、質の低いものは受け付けませぬゆえ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I do not accept anything of low quality."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうかなるほど、それはいい……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I see, that’s good then...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とみせかけてとーーーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or so it seems — taaaaaaake this!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「スイカバアアァァ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Watermelon BURST!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはパパデマスのボディに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance delivered a powerful kick to Papademas's body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 強烈な蹴りを加えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He struck with a fierce kick.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さっきから貴様、懐をやけに庇ってるだろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You've been strangely protecting your bosom all this time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後ろ暗いお宝とみた！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I bet you’ve got some shady treasure there!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、あっ、す、ストップ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, ah, s-stop…!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パパデマスは懐からラレラレ石を探り出された。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Papademas’s pocket was searched and the Rarerare stone was found.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほーら、持っていやがった！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "See? You were carrying it!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本命はこっちだろう！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is the real deal, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じっくり堪能してくれるわ。がはははは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I’ll savor it thoroughly. Gahaha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは受け取ったラレラレ石を捨て、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance discarded the received Rarerare stone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奪った石を手に、意気揚々と去っていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: took the stolen stone, and left triumphantly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「げほっ、げほ……ひ、ひどい……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Cough, cough... t-terrible..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （えーと、なんだっけ、あの石の中身……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Umm, what was inside that stone again...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「閣下。ラレラレ石を運んで欲しいとか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Your Excellency. You want me to carry the Rarerare stone...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、はい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, that's right."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 転がったラレラレ石を、拾って渡す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He picked up the rolled Rarerare stone and handed it over.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「確かに。命に替えても、ジオにお届けします」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Indeed. I will deliver it to Geo, even at the cost of my life."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ、よろしく」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Very well, thank you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジオにおける、パパデマスの支持率が下がった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Papademas's approval rating in Geo declined.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ある日。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドンは、いつもの業務の書類を処理していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Copandon was handling the usual business paperwork.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はいなはいな、っと……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, alright, then..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おん？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうかなさいました、コパンドン様？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is something the matter, Lord Copandon?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、こないだ目ぇつけてた、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, it’s about that big corrupt merchant I had my eye on the other day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大手の汚職業者がおったやんか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was a major corrupt company, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ……ひどい中抜きして物流止めてた……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... they were badly skimming off profits and disrupting logistics...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 内定と改善案はまだ調査中ですけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The preliminary decisions and improvement plans are still under investigation..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……いや、それがもう終わってるねん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...No, that’s already been resolved."
"Huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「別の業者に差し替えられてて、数字も適正や。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They replaced them with another company, and the figures are now proper.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんなん、すぐできる事と違うで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This isn't something that could be done quickly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「業者の身元は……んん、元リーザス王宮勤め……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The identity of the new company... hmm, they used to work at the Leazas Royal Palace...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あぁ、リア女王か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, Queen Lia, huh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、それなら分かる話ですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, that makes sense then."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「せやな。リアはんが見つけて…………
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah. It was Queen Lia who found them...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんで自由都市の流通助けるねん。おかしい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why would she help the freetown's distribution anyway? It's strange."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おかしい……ですかねえ……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "S-strange...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おかしいねんて。裏あるか……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It’s strange. Could there be something behind this...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それでしたら、リア様の意を受けて、私が」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If that’s the case, I am acting under Queen Lia's wishes."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……あー。裏ある話でっか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Ah. So it’s a story with some behind-the-scenes, huh?

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, it’s about that big corrupt merchant I had my eye on the other day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大手の汚職業者がおったやんか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was a major corrupt company, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ……ひどい中抜きして物流止めてた……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... they were badly skimming off profits and disrupting logistics...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 内定と改善案はまだ調査中ですけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The preliminary decisions and improvement plans are still under investigation..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……いや、それがもう終わってるねん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...No, that’s already been resolved."
"Huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「別の業者に差し替えられてて、数字も適正や。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They replaced them with another company, and the figures are now proper.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんなん、すぐできる事と違うで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This isn't something that could be done quickly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「業者の身元は……んん、元リーザス王宮勤め……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The identity of the new company... hmm, they used to work at the Leazas Royal Palace...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あぁ、リア女王か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, Queen Lia, huh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、それなら分かる話ですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, that makes sense then."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「せやな。リアはんが見つけて…………
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah. It was Queen Lia who found them...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんで自由都市の流通助けるねん。おかしい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why would she help the freetown's distribution anyway? It's strange."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おかしい……ですかねえ……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "S-strange...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おかしいねんて。裏あるか……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It’s strange. Could there be something behind this...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それでしたら、リア様の意を受けて、私が」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If that’s the case, I am acting under Queen Lia's wishes."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……あー。裏ある話でっか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Ah. So it’s a story with some behind-the-scenes, huh?
